messages.message: 1. It’s _far_ too slow. My understanding is that this needs to index the document on each request. This takes way too long for this to be useable in any solutions right now.
@Rakesh did this come up during your discussions with Hannah and @lydia ? Is it possible for us to not reindex the document on each request. I’m most likely missing context on the need to do this.
Pauline is currently working on this fix with Vineeth. Will let you know when it’s ready

what is the fix @pauline.comising @lydia? I pointed a long time ago that reindexing is slow and unnecessary during development, was suggesting some flag that people can choose to recreate index or not as a short term, and long term to have the backend recreate index automatically if index is missing or outdated. Both are better than re-indexing all the time.
